key.name: update-interval
key.description: Download interval (in minutes) for all RSS feeds.

key.name: items-visible
key.description: Number of items visible per source.

key.name: max-height
key.description: Maximum popup menu height (in pixels) before it starts scrolling.

key.name: fpoll-timeout
key.description: Throttles RSS source polls to reduce the performance impact on gnome-shell.

key.name: notification-limit
key.description: Maximum number of notifications shown at once

key.name: enable-notifications
key.description: Show notifications when new RSS items are found.

key.name: preserve-on-lock
key.description: Do not disable the extension when screen is deactivated or locked.

key.name: enable-descriptions
key.description: Show description received from RSS feed when selecting an article.

key.name: enable-debug
key.description: Enable extension logs debug messages in Gnome logs provider.

key.name: http-keep-alive
key.description: Set Keep-Alive in HTTP request headers

key.name: set-seen-when-closed
key.summary: Set all feeds as seen when closed.
key.description: Set all RSS feeds as seen whenever the user closes the main popup menu.
